sqlMap.select: select a.CSH_DJXH as cshDjxh,a.SS_JGBM as ssJgbm,a.ZCFL_DM as zcflDm,a.YHMC as yhmc,a.HM as hm, a.ZH as zh,a.CSJE as csje,a.QYBZ as qybz,a.YXBZ as yxbz,a.CJR_CZY_DJXH as cjrCzyDjxh, a.CJRQ as cjrq,a.XGR_CZY_DJXH as xgrCzyDjxh,a.XGRQ as xgrq from CW_HBZC_CSH a where a.CSH_DJXH=#cshDjxh#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_CW_DJXH.nextval as cshDjxh from dual
insert into CW_HBZC_CSH(CSH_DJXH,SS_JGBM,ZCFL_DM,YHMC,HM, ZH,CSJE,QYBZ,YXBZ,CJR_CZY_DJXH, CJRQ,XGR_CZY_DJXH,XGRQ) values(#cshDjxh:NUMERIC#,#ssJgbm:NUMERIC#,#zcflDm:NUMERIC#,#yhmc:VARCHAR#,#hm:VARCHAR#, #zh:VARCHAR#,#csje:NUMERIC#,#qybz:VARCHAR#,#yxbz:VARCHAR#,#cjrCzyDjxh:NUMERIC#, to_date(#cjrq:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd'),#xgrCzyDjxh:NUMERIC#,to_date(#xgrq:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
sqlMap.update: update CW_HBZC_CSH set CSH_DJXH=#cshDjxh#,SS_JGBM=#ssJgbm#,ZCFL_DM=#zcflDm#,YHMC=#yhmc#,HM=#hm#, ZH=#zh#,CSJE=#csje#,QYBZ=#qybz#,YXBZ=#yxbz#,CJR_CZY_DJXH=#cjrCzyDjxh#, CJRQ=to_date(#cjrq#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),XGR_CZY_DJXH=#xgrCzyDjxh#,XGRQ=to_date(#xgrq#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where CSH_DJXH=#cshDjxh#
sqlMap.delete: update CW_HBZC_CSH set yxbz='N' where CSH_DJXH=#cshDjxh#
